item.description: Notes on Retriable Http Client (with Golang/Rust example

item.title: 使用 library 实现 K8s apiserver
item.description: 理解 K8s apiserver 的最好方式就是自己动手实现同款

item.title: 实现一个极简 K8s apiserver
item.description: 本文实现了一个符合 Kubernetes REST 风格的极简 apiserver，代码量只有 500 行左右。无论是单独运行还是集成到 K8s 集群，它都支持 kubectl 增删改查操作。动手把玩这个 apiserver，可以很好理解 K8s apiserver aggregation 原理，以及 kubectl 与 apiserver 的交互机制

item.title: REST: Part 1 - HTTP API 设计思路
item.description: HTTP REST API 通用设计思路

item.title: Http Range Request and MP4 Video Play in Browser
item.description: HTTP range request is a widely used feature when it comes to file resource. Besides covering basic concept of range request, this blog show how HTTP range request works in browsers. Behaviors of Chrome, FireFox and Safari are coverd. several sample HTTP servers written in Golang are used to trick browsers.
